Research Themes

Our work spans several areas. Dive into each theme:

  • Medical Image Analysis
  • Computer Vision
  • Ecological Monitoring: Interpretable learning for ecological data, from species monitoring to environmental sensing.
  • Machine Learning: Core methodological work on probabilistic modeling, interpretability, and efficient training for inverse problems.
